Our trading income primarily comprises revenue generated from the sale of HR Coils, which constitute a key raw material in the manufacturing of welded pipes and tubes. We undertake trading activities to cater to the requirements of small-scale manufacturers who are unable to place advance orders or maintain large inventory levels, as well as manufacturers executing low-volume orders requiring immediate supply. In addition, we also supply HR Coils to sheet suppliers and PEB manufacturers located within our regional market. This trading activity enables us to optimize inventory utilization, strengthen customer relationships across the value chain, and enhance our overall revenue base.
